content.detailedDescription:
Taking pictures of the sunset behind clouds on 7/9/2017.  we were looking to the west.  i did not notice the object until i reviewed the pictures.  the pictures were taken on a samsung galaxy s8 phone.  the pictures were all taken withing 12 seconds of each other as follows:

071.Jpg - ‎sunday, ‎july ‎09, ‎2017, ‏‎7:20:31 pm - image shows a round object just above the cloud line in the center of the picture.  the object is not as clear in image as it is in the others, but, appears to have defined round shape.

072.Jpg - ‎sunday, ‎july ‎09, ‎2017, ‏‎7:20:40 pm - object is well above the cloud line and in line with the highest set of wispy clouds.  zooming in it is obvious that this is the same shape as the first image but is more clearly defined when zooming in.

073.Jpg - ‎sunday, ‎july ‎09, ‎2017, ‏‎7:20:42 pm - this image is taken 2 seconds after the previous and the object appears to be significantly lower than the previous image but just a clearly defined when zooming in.

initially i thought this may be the moon, however, this was the night of the full moon which was rising in the eastern sky. it looks like a planet or moon to me but, would have to be very large to be that visible...And i can't explain the movement.  the angle of the first picture is a little different but, the second two are very similar angles.
content.summary: Object moved verticle to the horizon up and down.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at home one night when i got a phone call from a friend who lived down the road and told me to go outside and look at the sky. we both sat on the phone and talked for about 20 minutes looking up into the sky was a huge round orangish glowing ball just floating. you could tell it wasn't staying in one spot it was moving just a little, but staying in the same general area. it never got closer or further for about 20 minutes. i had so much time i could have ran inside and grabbed a camera or even called out to my mom to come out and look but for some reason nothing like that crossed my mind. so i just stood there outside for 20 minutes on the phone talking to my friend who was watching the same thing about a couple miles down the road from me. after 20 minutes the globe in the air just went across the sky in a blink of an eye and just vanished. i really doubt we were the only two people who seen it that day. it had to had been around 2004-2006. no idea what exact day or even year. i was in high school at the time. reporting the incident never came to mind until i recently been watching a ufo documentary on netflix that got me thinking that i should share my story.
content.summary: Seen huge round orangish glowing ball at night in sky for 20 minutes and then swept across sky like a shooting star and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
As we were driving down the road back to our home town 
we saw a ball of fire in the sky, you could see the clouds lit up from it 
at first we thought it was forest fire but we then noticed it wasn't 
then we kinda lost it cuz the road was all curvey then we got to the area where it's all cleared 
that's when we saw just above the treeline just hovering, it couldn't be anything else other than a ufo, what else descents in a ball of fire then to hover without making any noise at all and plus be seen by another person 80 kms away, must've been huge we saw it west and the other person saw it north west,
my girlfriend was scared cuz she was non believer, but she now believes, i felt excitement and shocked that i actually witnessed a ufo,
it was 2am now, i drove home cuz i was tired and that thing was still there when i left, i called police to check and they didn't see anything when they got there...
drove home because my kid was sleeping in the back seat from a 12 hour trip..I thought what if...The abductions are true so i left...Parental instincts kicked in
i post my sighting on facebook and a friend from the nearest town saw the same thing on the same night and time..With his gf also
content.summary: Look like a ball of fire descending only to see it hover just above the tree line.100% ufo

content.detailedDescription:
On 6/23/17 i woke up and found that my underwear was on inside out and
backward with mud on it. there was a needle mark in my right arm where one
would get an iv. there was a somewhat circular mark on the wall that glows
under black light. the glowing mark is approximately 2x3 inches.

on 6/11/17 i woke up in the early morning and it was still dark outside.
i felt a very strong beam of pressure holding me down on my bed. i was
scared and started to struggle to get away from the pressure. i kept 
trying to stand up but was prevented from movement. a telepathic method
entered my brain that said "the pressure is on your pelvic bone to hold
you down so you don't fall out of bed". when i awoke in the morning there
were black and blue marks on my abdomen. there was an 18 in black mark
on the wall near my bed and the source was unknown. there was bruising
on my left leg between my knee and ankle.

i have a recent history of ongoing milab and alien abductions.
content.summary: Two alien abductions

content.detailedDescription:
On 7/1/17, at approximately 2:00 am, i heard my patio door open and a male
whisper. i knew there was going to be a milab and i started to panic. just
as i was about to jump out of bed and meet them at my bedroom door, i started receiving mental telepathy that was saying "just let it happen."
the message kept repeating until i understood it was from the alien race
who usually abducts me on a regular basis. i relaxed and blacked out. my
dog was sleeping on my bed with me and didn't even move.

in the morning, when i woke up, i instantly recalled the event. there was
a fresh needle mark on my arm where one would get an iv.

3 days prior to the abduction, i noticed a new light had been put in my
bedroom. i knew it was observation. the light was golden and was placed in
the corner where the ceiling met the wall. it was directed at my bed. the
light was gone after the milab.
content.summary: Milab

content.detailedDescription: The lights were coming from the left side of us. they were moving constantly forward and more up into the sky. they were blinking in different colours. see video loaded.
content.summary: Many lights blinking first nearby, then next to moon

content.detailedDescription:
Saw an object, kind of elliptical shape, glowing goldish/orange colour move from east to west at very high speed. object was fairly low on the horizon. it is hard to guess the size as it was at least couple of km away (my guess), it could be less, but at that distance i would say it seemed like good 5cm object. 
there was no sound observed, usually i hear airplanes even with closed door and this was much larger object than the 737.
i checked for reflection from tv or other light sources but the object wasn't distorted like the reflection of other light sources or tv. 
i didn't have much room to observe as the object moved between the treeline and the roof of neighbors house but in the distance. my guess that it all lasted 3 seconds but it could have been less than that.
content.summary: Watched object moved fast from east to west

content.detailedDescription: While trying to capture photos of the northern lights on sunday evening/early morning monday, i witnessed a flashing light that went from bright white to red and then would vanish.  i saw this happen twice between the span of 30 to 45 minutes.  the first one was sighted roughly around midnight and the second one, roughly 30 or so minutes later.  i tried to capture it on my camera but was unable too.  i only witnessed this happening two times through the 3 hours i was taking photographs to the east, but it really stood out as unusual.  there was air traffic turning and coming in from the east to the west to land at spokane international airport (geg), but what i saw did not resemble any kind of aircraft nor was it moving and transitioning through the sky, as it was stationary.  object/light appeared to be about 2,000 to 3,000 feet in elevation and about halfway between the summit of mount spokane and newman lake, which resides to the south.
content.summary: Stationary white light followed by red light, then vanished.  two sightings of this.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving along and witnessed a metallic sphere move through the clouds and then hover. i lost sight of the object around the next bend.
content.summary: Silver matalic sphere

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard a few minutes after midnight observing the night sky with my binoculars. after ten minutes of viewing the sky, i observed an object moving at a constant quick speed. it looked just like a distant star and it seemed to be beyond earth's atmosphere, in the range of a satellite, but it moved at least 20 times faster than a satellite. i viewed it from the west and it headed towards mt. hood direction. i viewed the object for approximately 30 seconds until it faded from my binocular view. it never changed colors or size.
content.summary: Star object flying at constant quick speed

content.detailedDescription:
I pulled out of my driveway and drove up my street. there was a car sitting
there watching my house. it was black, mid 60's, 4-door galaxy. i'm a 
classical car guy, so i know my cars well. i have attached some pictures
of the kind of car it was. the windows were solid black and  i could not see in them at all.  the license plate was solid white with black trim and no numbers on it at all.  when it saw me coming toward it, it took off.
i turned left and went up a few blocks and there was the car again waiting
for me. when i passed it, it started following me. it followed me for a 
couple of miles and got right on me to the point i braked to get him off
me. i was watching him in my rear view mirror back off and then i checked
my speedometer for a fraction of a second to check my speed. i looked back
in my mirror and the car was gone. it vanished into thin air. this was on
a strip of the highway with no exits. there were no other cars around. it
was impossible to get off that road let alone in a fraction of a second. i
pulled over and got out of my car and looked around. i could view a long
ways and the car was no where to be seen. this is a situation that i can
not find any explanation for other than what i think it was. i will keep
my eyes open for anything else.
content.summary: Mib encounter

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were standing in an open field watching the crabtree fireworks off in the distance.  we were about 4 miles away from crabtree and we could just see the fireworks above a ridge of trees.  it was a very clear night and we were admiring all the stars out.  suddenly, in another part of the sky and very, very high up, a flash of light caught our attention. my first thought was that it was a shooting star, but as it streaked westward across the sky, it made a slight pause, and then shot off and slightly upward and disappeared. it wasn't like it went out of sight, it just disappeared. this sounds strange, but it was so fast that my eyes literally had trouble keeping up with it.  it was definitely not a shooting star and i seriously doubt that any man-made object could go that fast. it reminded me a how a sparkler will momentarily leave a bright trail behind it. my husband describes it as a bright thin transparent object. the whole event lasted maybe 10 seconds.
content.summary: Long, thin, very bright light appeared suddenly, seemed to do a quick skip and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Ok, i was staining a deck yesterday,decided to take five. it was clear blue sky full on sun nearly directly over head.I was laying on my back in such away that the roof of the house just barely blocked the sun. that's when i saw it. at first glance i thought it was a sea gull, we do have them here. it only took me 5 or ten seconds to realise it was much too high to be a bird. seconds later a commercial plane passed underneath and i was able to get some perspective distancewise. it was pure white non metallic, stopped on a dime went left, then right i would guess hundreds of feet in but a moment. it also moved in a clockwise circle then counter clockwise. that's when i definitely realised i needed to get up. i did actually think i should take a photo or video, but in the back of my mind i knew that my phone wouldn't catch it with its proximity to the sun. i watched it for another 30 seconds as it rapidly move southish. then it finally vanished from sight, it didn't disappear, just got further and further till my eyes couldn't pick it out of the sky. as far as how i felt about it, still kinda processing but i guess the thing that surprised me is the lack of any feeling really. no fear,no excitement, no self doubt,maybe a sense of calm if anything.I guess i feel a responsibility to say something and would be curious if anyone else saw it. feel free to call or email me i'm not afraid of anyone calling me nuts. i know what i saw. best regards, hunter t
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I first thought it was a bird but birds can't stop mid air and move sideways. nor can they can they move that fast

content.detailedDescription: I was capture this photo from roof building with more than 50 people arround me with. i was made photos for a birthday party . when i almost done i wanna try a shot with my 85 mm 1,2 canon lens and capture the parthenon . with our eyes the sky was always dark no lights when i take the picture i was sure that maybe the light s  effect the lens i change place possition and capture again , well the lights was there .. then i zoom the pic and i realise that the lights on top of parthenon have shadow like a triangle aircraft . i wanna tell to people that on top of parthenon never fly anything not even birds u can search about it . all my friends and the people who was at the party we was like what is this why we cant see anything with our eyes and only the camera capture all this lights ?
content.summary: Triangle with 3 light objects one left down one on top up and one right down shadow  arround the lights

content.detailedDescription: Two stationary objects starlike blinking pulsing equal but not on sinc, one under, other above during 8 seconds then disappeared. all time on east side.
content.summary: Two ufos blinking pulsing equal but not on sinc, one under, other above during 8 seconds then disappear.

content.detailedDescription:
few stars one super bright noticed  light moving up down across sky 90 degree turns then  traveled towards me seen through binoculars  could see flames and heat on leading edge stops revers travel out of sight in 5 sec.


was driving home at time of sighting

noticed it because it was not only the brightest light in sky but was super bright

on first sight must be the moon (to small but brighter than any moon i have seen)

round shaped,travel pattern as if you had a laser light moving it as fast as you could up,down,across pattern with 90 degree turns

stop and exited car this is really a ufo cool until it started getting closer and closer then thinking this is not so cool about that time it changed direction

reversed direction only took about 5 sec. to be out of sight
content.summary: few stars one super bright noticed  light moving up down across sky 90 degree turns then  traveled towards me seen through binoculars  could see flames and heat on leading edge stops revers travel out of sight in 5 sec.

content.detailedDescription: I was just enjoying the pool at the key vista clubhouse and taking pics of the sky because the clouds looked beautiful and after i took the picture i noticed on the right, top of my picture a weird, blue shape. but i didn't hear a plane or helicopter while i was taking the picture.
content.summary: I was taking a pic and see a weird shape in it. didn't see it when taking the picture.

content.detailedDescription:
Continued
this light was moving silantly across the sky. i was afraid to continue to look at it or take a pic. it continued into the east.
the next morning i asked some that was present what they saw and they said that it was the space station, as i told him. it was not, this was massive, the space station is a little blink
content.summary: Summer evening preparing to roast a pig in the ground. i mentioned to the group standing there with me if you look at the sky you might see the space station. everyone went silent and looked towards the west/north west. there was a huge light in the sky m

content.detailedDescription: At midnight looking north a friend and i were enjoying a campfire when we saw a ufo flying straight across the horizon heading west with random red and blue flashing lights at a high rate of speed approximatly four times the speed of a f14 fighter jet described by a pilot whom was also a witness, then it changed direction in the opposite direction without slowing down, the g forceses were to great to have any human to survive and then disapered as if it bolted off into the distance. nothing known to man, not a drone, not an aircraft. unknown size or distance but at least larger than a blimp. area is a fly zone to an airport, so alot of action with aircraft has been seen and is not the ufo in question.
content.summary: Red blue flashing ufo high rate of speed stopped and changed direction without pause four times faster than f14 fighter jet a pilot also witnessed,not my first encounter with ufo

content.detailedDescription: I went outside because the twilight cloud cover had turned the world this shade of red. the shadows were this creepy red color and the air seem to be extremely still. not many people were paying attention until i began to snap off pictures with my camera. i was in my yard at first then went out into the street under all the trees. i saw a faint light in the clouds. it looked like a star but i knew stars could not be under the clouds. i took pictures of it but my camera started to mess up along with my wi-fi connection. the object was at first just dangling there and then it sort of swerved slowly and then dropped. when i went back inside to refresh the batteries in my camera i heard a jet passing by but it seem to be extremely low to be flying at its current speed. i went back out onto my porch and noticed it was a military jet. it was flying in the direction of where the object was. my devices and even my television was not working properly for about 4 hours after the incident. i did end up with one picture of the object star like figure and several really pretty cloud pictures.
content.summary: Went outside because the twilight turned the world red. snapped some pictures and seen object flashing faintly in sky.

content.detailedDescription: At midnight looking north a friend and i were enjoying a campfire when we saw a ufo flying straight across the horizon heading west with random red and blue flashing lights at a high rate of speed approximatly four times the speed of a f14 fighter jet described by a pilot whom was also a witness, then it changed direction in the opposite direction without slowing down, the g forceses were to great to have any human to survive and then disapered as if it bolted off into the distance. nothing known to man, not a drone, not an aircraft. unknown size or distance but at least larger than a blimp. area is a fly zone to an airport, so alot of action with aircraft has been seen and is not the ufo in question.
content.summary: Red blue flashing ufo high rate of speed stopped and changed direction without pause four times faster than f14 fighter jet a pilot also witnessed,not my first encounter with ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home from work. came around a bend and saw a shiny object in sky.. the reflection caught my attention. i wasn't sure of what it was but it reminded me of a bright star. as i was driving it got dimmer and i realized it was because  i changed position while driving and it was reflecting the light.. it looked like an egg turned on its side. it hovered for about 15 seconds. i started to grab my phone to snap a picture. then it started moving and then took off and was gone like it was never there.
my feelings during the sighting went from what is that to i just saw a ufo. the only actions i took were to grab my phone and driving. after the sighting i tried to call my wife and tell her but she didn't answer her phone. it was 6:57 am according to my phone when i tried to call her.
i lost sight of the object because it moved so fast it was just gone.
content.summary: Shiny object, hovered 15 seconds, started to move slowly then shot off.

content.detailedDescription: While stargazing, we seen a bright light, it was hovering, it started blinking and a flame came out of it and  it changed direction and disappeared.
content.summary: While stargazing, we seen a bright light was hovering, it started blinking a flame came out of it and  it changed direction and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Today july 16, 2017  at 11:49pm ish i was getting ready to had to bed so i started to close my blinds and i looked up at the sky and saw a glowing green light in the sky at first i though it was a plane but then it looked like a huge version of a green lightning bug and started descending to the ground and i realized then it wasn't a plane, when it landed it stayed in one area for about 15 minutes. it looked like a extremely green light was sitting in the woods next to my house. l felt terrified i felt as if something really bad could happen right now if they saw me look at them so i closed my blinds and closed the curtains. after the sighting i felt like i should do some research so i looked up what to do if you sighted a ufo and that's how i'm filling out this report right now.
content.summary: I looked at the sky and saw a bigger version of a lightning bug falling from the sky and eventually landing in the woods next to my house. it looked like a star that has fallen.

content.detailedDescription: On friday, june 10, 2017 @ 5:15pm it was a cool evening not a cloud in the blue sky. i was sitting on my balcony in laguna woods talking to a friend facing east. while gazing at saddleback mountain i noticed a shimmering metal object in the sky & thought it was a plane at first. as i kept my eye on it i realized that it was too vertical looking to be a plane so i grabbed my binoculars to see what it was. while looking through the binoculars i saw a pulsating red light coming from within the center column of the object, couldn't see the red light without the binoculars so i decided to grab my dslr camera 16-270mm lens to take a few shots of it & look at it through my viewfinder. the object moved out of view before i could grab my tripod to get better shots. the consecutive shots shows that the object was changing in appearance & i believe rotating in circles while moving west in a straight line across the sky towards the ocean.
content.summary: Vertical metal object floating across the sky

content.detailedDescription: This is in the 70's late 60's me and my brother and our other friends were playing out in the tundra outside our village it was summer so the sun didn't go down till late at night, as we came up on a small hill we all felt the humming in our bodies and was curious as to what made us feel that within us then the other kids ran off scared and left me my brother and another friend and his brother we decided to look over the small hill and we saw 3 barrel shaped objects hovering exactly the same height above the ground in front of us there were lights twirling around them but the other craft remained stationary, even tho they looked to be separated it felt like one craft, after about 15 to 20 minutes they took off at an angle at the same time tilted and blinked out at an astonishing rate of speed and was gone. i was the first to go and observe the burnt marks it left i felt a wave of sickness coming over me and my brother grabbed me and took me away.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Felt the humming first then saw 3 craft in a triangular formation hovering above the ground

content.detailedDescription: My daughter (10y/o) just came home from her summer vacation with her godmother. i was not with her, she took her cell phone and took pics of the plane taking off. this was her time on a plane, she was so excited to show me the wings of the plane and the pretty clouds. i have attached the photos at the bottom. she didn't even notice these bizzare lights...But of course, i did. these lights are very weird and there is no explaination from my based knowledge. because i was not with her, i cannot anwer most of the questions you asked above, so i am hoping you could help identify what this is. they came from her cell phone. it is a cheap phone, i sent the pictures to my email, downloaded it and am sending to you now. i watch your show all the time and know that you all could figure it out.
content.summary: My daughter took pics of her take off and i noticed orbs of light in her pics.

content.detailedDescription: On july 16th at about 12:30am i was letting my dog out and standing on my back deck. i looked up at the sky and was noticing how clear the sky was and how bright all the stars were. i then noticed right above me there was a large black triangle moving slowly and silently across the sky. it was flying quite low and had no lights of any kind. it was almost like you could only just see the outlines. i watched this object for about 1 1/2 minutes trying to decide if i was actually seeing what i was seeing. my dog started to bark and i got very scared and rushed back into the house.
content.summary: I was letting my dog out and looked up at the sky because the stars were so clear. i saw a large black triangle flying slowly over my house. it made no sound and had no lights. i watched it for about 1 1/2 mins trying to decide if i was really seeing it..

content.detailedDescription: Large ship appeared above a dark mist about a mile in the sky around 10:30 pm. the ship appeared to have about 10-15 lights around it or on it.The event took place for about 15 seconds. the large craft was sitting in one place in the sky and seemed to get brighter then a portal began to open up one square of light at a time like a light disco floor. til a diamond shape of light was objected from the craft then the portal was open and it vanished through it. a photo has been taken and i would like to share with someone that can be trusted. you can clearly depict the large mothership in the photo and see the portal it created right before leaving.
content.summary: Large ship appeared in sky: had a dark mist under it and over 15 lights either on or around it. opened a portal at first started as bright green sqaures opening up in the sky one at a time til a diamond of light formed like a portal. then it vanished

content.detailedDescription:
Je fais la dclaration pour les tmoins.

le 05/07/2017  22h sbastien est sorti dans son jardin, ils a aperus des lumires dans le ciel.Direction so 234
3 sphres aligns qui semblait dessiner un cigare en position horizontale, cet ensemble s'est redress verticalement comme pour observer le sol ou un cabanon situ dans les environs.
le tmoin dclare que ces comme des petits soleils.
il a pris des photos

sbastien a appel son ami qui  vu les lumires et et partit prvenir ses voisines.

ces voisines sont arrives vers 10h20, elles ont vu les lumires rapparatre en venant de l'ouest vers 22h30 comme si elle sortaient de l'horizon et se dplaaient dans le ciel, pour elle les sphres taient indpendante.
il y a eu aussi la prsence de petite boules rouge et bleu.

les tmoins ont entendu un hlicoptre pendant cette observation.
content.summary: Des lumires sont apparues dans le ciel, se sont dplacs, ont disparues puis sont rapparues
